name: Space Conquer #LD37
description:
Space Conquer is a 1980's style arcade space shooter game made for Ludum Dare 37 Compo!

CONTROLS:

W-A-S-D // Arrow Keys (NOTE: WASD Works better!) -- Player Movement

Space -- Shoot

O -- Slow Motion

P -- WHIPLASH (5 uses!)

E -- Insert Credits!

============================================

DO NOT CHANGE ANY OPTIONS ON THE SPLASH SCREEN!!! IT IS IMPORTANT THAT YOU DO NOT CHANGE ANY OPTIONS OTHER THAN RESOLUTION!
